Package org.archive.nutchwax

Class Summary
ArcReader Reader of both ARC and WARC format archive files.
CacheSettingsFilter  
Importer Import Archive files (.arc/.warc) files into a newly-created Nutch segment.
Indexer Create indexes for segments.
IndexerMapReduce  
IndexMerger IndexMerger creates an index for the output corresponding to a single fetcher run.
NutchWax  
OpenSearchServlet Present search results using A9's OpenSearch extensions to RSS, plus a few Nutch-specific extensions.
PageRankDb Maintains an inverted link map, listing incoming links for each url.
PageRankDbFilter This class provides a way to separate the URL normalization and filtering steps from the rest of LinkDb manipulation code.
PageRankDbMerger This tool merges several PageRankDb-s into one, optionally filtering URLs through the current URLFilters, to skip prohibited URLs and links.
XSLTFilter
